pr_title: #2177 Mapping into a generic class with a typed constructor argument should work

timeline.message: #2177 Mapping into a generic class with a typed constructor argument should work

timeline.bodyText: I saw that you also added code for java14 records.. should we have a testcase for that ?
timeline.author: sjaakd

replies.bodyText: You are right it doesn't work for generic records. I'll add a test case and fix for that as well
replies.author: filiphr
